This forum is to discuss the ongoing Presidential, Congressional, and State races. I proposed this forum to discuss absolutely everything about the elections, from who to support, to strategy. It is my hope that a good discussion about the issues, candidates, and strategy for the upcoming caucuses, primaries, conventions, and generals.
 
 Let the discussion begin!!!
